Captain.Title: Gowron
Captain.Ability: If this card is assigned to a Klingon ship and all of your Shields have been destroyed, you may gain +1 attack die on all of your attacks. If any of your Shield Tokens are repaired, you lose this bonus attack die.

Captain.Title: Insectoid Councilor
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Each time your ship attacks this roound, during the Modify Defense Dice step, you may convert one of your opponent's [EVADE] results into a blank result. Inflict one damage to your ship's Shields or Hull.

Captain.Title: Kurn
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is within Range 1 of an Obstacle, roll 2 attack dice. Every ship within Range 1 fo the Obstacle suffers damage as normal for each [HIT] or [CRIT] result. Ships do not roll defense dice against this.
